*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to chief of the Cherokees, April 24, 1826. Asking cooperation and outlining plan for campaign against Waco and Tahuacano Indians. Austin's relations with Shawnees in Missouri.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*My FRIENDS AND BROTHERS,*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Mexican Government*/person_mentioned* have called on the new *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*of this *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*to fight their *person_mentioned*enemies */person_mentioned*the *person_mentioned*Wacos */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Tawakanies */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Toweass Indians*/person_mentioned* Indians. The *person_mentioned*cherokees */person_mentioned*and their *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*the *person_mentioned*Shawnees */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Delawares */person_mentioned*are also new *person_mentioned*Settlers*/person_mentioned*; like us they have come to seek a new *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*in this *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*and procure *location_mentioned*lands */location_mentioned*from the *location_mentioned*Mexican Nation*/location_mentioned*, and like us they also owe obedience to the orders of the Government and are bound in duty to fight the *person_mentioned*enemies */person_mentioned*of the *person_mentioned*Mexican people*/person_mentioned*. I can with confidence answer for the *person_mentioned*cherokees */person_mentioned*that they are good *person_mentioned*warriors*/person_mentioned*, but as yet they have not had an opportunity of proving to their new *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*the *person_mentioned*mexicans */person_mentioned*how useful they can be—you have no doubt been anxious to do so and have always been ready to turn out and fight for your new *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, you sent me word by *person_mentioned*Mr John Cummins*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*John Miligan*/person_mentioned* that you would join us to fight the *person_mentioned*wacos */person_mentioned*whenever I called on you. I have always looked upon you as *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*who could be depended on I am happy to inform you that an opportunity now offers for you to shew the Govt that you are both good *person_mentioned*warriors */person_mentioned*and good *person_mentioned*citizens*/person_mentioned*. The *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*of this *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*will attack the *person_mentioned*waco */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Tawakany */person_mentioned**location_mentioned*villages on the Brazos */location_mentioned*on the morning of the *date_mentioned n="05-25-1826">25 of may next*/date_mentioned*, and I now call on you both as an *person_mentioned*officer*/person_mentioned* of the Mexican Govt and as a *person_mentioned*friend */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*brother */person_mentioned*to aid us in the war with those *person_mentioned*Indians*/person_mentioned*. My plan is for the*person_mentioned* Militia of this Colony*/person_mentioned* to attack the *person_mentioned*waco */person_mentioned*and *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Tawakany */person_mentioned*villageson the main brazos river*/location_mentioned* at day light on the *date_mentioned n="05-25-1826">25 of May*/date_mentioned* and for the *person_mentioned*Cherokees */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Shawnees */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Delawares */person_mentioned*to attack the *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Tawak[an]y */person_mentioned*village on the head of the Navisotabout 30 miles east of the Brazos */location_mentioned*at the same moment. As soon as the *location_mentioned*villages */location_mentioned*are destroyed, you will send a *person_mentioned*party */person_mentioned*in to the *location_mentioned*villages on the river */location_mentioned*to look for us and we will then make such arrangements as may be deemed necessary. It is my wish to distroy the *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Toweass */person_mentioned*villageon Red River*/location_mentioned* before I return *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*and if you have *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*enough to spare to detach a *person_mentioned*party */person_mentioned*to attack that *location_mentioned*village*/location_mentioned* at the same time we attack the others it would be best, to do so. If this cannot be done bring all your *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*to the *person_mentioned*Tawakanies */person_mentioned*and we will fit out a *person_mentioned*party */person_mentioned*to attack the *person_mentioned*Toweass*/person_mentioned*—My *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*I have informed you of my plans I have placed great confidence in you for you are the only *person_mentioned*persons */person_mentioned*out of this *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*that I have called on for aid—I am the *person_mentioned*friend */person_mentioned*of the *person_mentioned*cherokees*/person_mentioned*, and wish to give them an opportunity of shewing the *person_mentioned*Government */person_mentioned*what good *person_mentioned*soldiers */person_mentioned*and faithful *person_mentioned*citizens */person_mentioned*they will make and I have no doubt if you turn out in this expedition and distroy the *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Tawakany */person_mentioned*village on the head of the Navisot*/location_mentioned*, that it will be the means of securing you *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*in the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*for as many of your *person_mentioned*Nation */person_mentioned*as wish to remove here—I have no authority to promise you land, but I will promise my aid and friendship in your favor with the *person_mentioned*Government */person_mentioned*and I have no doubt of succeeding, but you must first show the *person_mentioned*Government */person_mentioned*that you are both able and willing to fight for them. I will also befriend the *person_mentioned*Shawnees */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Delawares*/person_mentioned*. Some of them may know me My *person_mentioned*father*/person_mentioned* has had *person_mentioned*hundreds of them*/person_mentioned* at his home at the *location_mentioned*Lead Mines*/location_mentioned* in *location_mentioned*Missouri*/location_mentioned*, he was a *person_mentioned*short fat man*/person_mentioned* and lived at a place called *location_mentioned*Mine á Burton*/location_mentioned*, he traded with the *person_mentioned*Shawnees */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Delawares */person_mentioned*and was their friend I was then a *person_mentioned*little boy */person_mentioned*and have often played with the *person_mentioned*Shawnee children*/person_mentioned*—we are now men and let us fight in union and together as we used to play—*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*bearer */person_mentioned*of this is *person_mentioned*Mr John R, Foster*/person_mentioned* I have sent him express to see you and wish you to write me a positive answer by him wheither you will join us in this war and wheither you will attack [the] *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Tawakany */person_mentioned*villageon the head of the Navisot */location_mentioned*at the time appointed. And how many *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*you can furnish*/p*
*p*I wish you to keep the business a profound secret from the *person_mentioned*Keechies*/person_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Ananies */person_mentioned*and all those *person_mentioned*small tribes*/person_mentioned*—They are bad *person_mentioned*Indians*/person_mentioned* and are at war with the *person_mentioned*mexicans */person_mentioned*and friendly with the *person_mentioned*Tawakanies*/person_mentioned*. also keep it a secret from the *person_mentioned*Americans */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Spaniards */person_mentioned*for some of them might give our *person_mentioned*enemies */person_mentioned*notice My men on the *location_mentioned*Colorado */location_mentioned*killed eleven *person_mentioned*Tawakanies */person_mentioned*and two *person_mentioned*Keechis */person_mentioned*on the *date_mentioned n="04-03-1826">3d day of this month*/date_mentioned*— they came into the *location_mentioned*settlement */location_mentioned*to steal horses—*/p*
*p*I wish you to send me an *person_mentioned*express */person_mentioned*to the home of *person_mentioned*John P Coles*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*ten miles below the San Antonio road*/location_mentioned* on the *location_mentioned*east side of the Brazos river*/location_mentioned* to inform me when you start on the expedition and how many men you will take so that I may know to a certainty how to make my arrangements*/p*
*p*Your friend and Brother, *person_mentioned* S. F. A.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="04-24-1826">April 24, 1826*/date_mentioned*—-*/p*
